sentence.Network_en: "You don't need to do that," said Pearl assertively.
sentence.Network_cn: “你不需要那么做，”珀尔斩钉截铁地说道。

sentence.Network_en: Using the right body language helps you communicate more assertively.
sentence.Network_cn: 使用正确的肢体语言会帮助你更有主张力的交流.

sentence.Network_en: Learning to communicate assertively involves learning to be honest, open and direct.
sentence.Network_cn: 果敢自信的交往方式的学习包括做到为人诚实 、 坦率和直言不讳.

过度自信（Assertiveness）是你想询问和想告诉的程度，其实是衡量你自己影响他人的程度。如果你倾向于多告诉，那么你是属于很 …

宣_百度百科 ... 宣布[ declare;proclaim;announce] 宣称[ assert;declare;profess] 宣传队[ propaganda team].
因为到处都是通过感觉、联想、类比而来的论断（assertion），而不是有逻辑力量的论证。比如他选定的26位文学大师中竟有弗洛伊 …

entry.tran: 观点明确的；坚决主张的
entry.def: Someone who is assertive states their needs and opinions clearly, so that people take notice.

example.ex: Women have become more assertive in the past decade.
example.tran: 女性在过去十年中已变得更加自信。

sentences.sentence: "`I will take care of my own life,' she said assertively"
